Package org.cs3.pl.prolog

Interface Summary
AsyncPrologSession Prolog Session for asynchronous queries.
AsyncPrologSessionListener  
Disposable  
LifeCycleHook hook into the PIFs lifecycle.
LifeCycleHook2  
PrologInterface  
PrologInterface2  
PrologInterfaceListener  
PrologLibrary A contribution to the Prolog file lookup path.
PrologSession

PrologLibraryManager TODO: this should be an interface.
PrologLibraryManagerTest  
 

Exception Summary
PrologException A prolog exception is thrown when a prolog query executed through a PrologSession raised an exception in the prolog runtime.
PrologInterfaceException A PrologInterfaceException is thrown when a PrologInterface looses the connection to the prolog process due to an error.
